annotations.description: Following on from our last video - all about the essentials to building your home bar - I thought I’d better show you 3 easy to make, but very different cock...
annotations.title: Fun & Easy Cocktail Recipes for Lockdown

textContent:
40ml (1 & 1/3oz) blanco tequila
20ml (2/3 oz) Apricot Brandy 
20ml (2/3oz) lime juice
1 dash Bitters
5ml (1/6oz) simple syrup

Shake and pour into coupe
